definition: to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Control then passes both to the subroutine and the caller.
sentences.chinese: 之后，控制权交给子函数和调用者。

sentences.english: They are deconsolidated from the date that control ceases.
sentences.chinese: 从丧失实际控制权之日起停止合并。

sentences.english: One fall-out of tapas is control over nature.
sentences.chinese: 一个属于淘汰塔帕斯是控制权的性质。

sentences.english: You’ll have total control and no-one can take it away from you.
sentences.chinese: 你需要全部的控制权，而且没有人能拿走它。

sentences.english: It also means, pilots complain, that the pilot surrenders control.
sentences.chinese: 飞行员们抱怨说，这还意味着飞行员交出了控制权。

sentences.english: Jim had acquired sole control of the newspaper in 1914.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆于一九一四年就取得了对该报的单独控制权。

sentences.english: Amercia intends to get military supremacy over other nations.
sentences.chinese: 美国企图获得对他国的军事控制权。

sentences.english: So how do we wrest back control and start being civil to each other again?
sentences.chinese: 那么，我们如何夺回控制权，彼此重新开始以礼相待？

sentences.english: Moreover, Republicans will have unprecedented control over redistricting.
sentences.chinese: 还有，共和党在重划选区上将有史无前例的控制权。

sentences.english: Loss has not embittered him or made him cynical.
sentences.chinese: 然而控制权的丧失并未使他痛苦不堪或愤世嫉俗。

sentences.english: Los Chachos eventually lost control of the border town to the Zetas, who still control it, and Mr.
sentences.chinese: 洛斯卡口斯团伙最终不敌哲塔斯失去对边城的控制权。

sentences.english: Negative-G forces "unload the rotor" and rotor control authority is lost.
sentences.chinese: 负荷势力“卸载转子”和转子控制权丢失。

sentences.english: From Colonel Gaddafi's compound, smoke can be seen rising as the two sides fight for control there.
sentences.chinese: 由于双方仍在争夺控制权，卡扎菲上校官邸烟雾弥漫。

sentences.english: Criminal organizations are competing for control of drug trafficking into the United States.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪组织正在为把麻药输往美国的控制权而顽固拼命。

sentences.english: Take control and before you know it you will mesmerize the person of your choice.
sentences.chinese: 保持控制权，你已经让你看中的人很着迷了。

sentences.english: Remember that your responsibility can be exercised only on what you have real power over.
sentences.chinese: 记住，只有自己拥有真正的控制权，才能履行职责。

definition: initiative (as in "seize the initiative")/advantageous position that allows one to call the shots
to take back (forcibly)/to recapture/to win back
to seize/to capture/to wrest control of
to withdraw/to leave/to retreat/to pull out
